author: ETA PRIME
description:
Yes, this is a $25 prepaid phone running GameCube and even some PS2 games. 😅
In this video I turn the Straight Talk Moto G (2025) into a full handheld gaming console for emulation, Android games, and game streaming.
We’ll go over the specs of this crazy-cheap Moto G, update it to Android 16, add a microSD card, pair it with a telescopic controller, and test everything from Dreamcast and PSP all the way up to GameCube, Wii, some PS2, Steam Link, Moonlight, and cloud gaming. For under $40, this thing is way better than I expected.

Straight Talk Motorola moto g 2025 Walmart: https://howl.link/wd504rztstb99
Micro SD Card: https://amzn.to/44xVboI
Coolaado Bluetooth Mobile Gaming Controller: https://amzn.to/4pLR0xU
8Bitdo Ultimate Mobile Gaming: https://amzn.to/3MfyGyy

title: Turn This $25 Android Phone Into a Handheld Game Console!
